mapper.insert: insert into score (examCode, uid, score) values (#{examCode}, #{uid}, #{score})
mapper.select: select qNumber, answer, qPoint from question where examCode=#{examCode} order by qNumber
select s.examCode, s.score, s.uid from score as s join exam as e on s.examCode = e.examCode where e.subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and s.uid=#{uid}
select s.examCode, s.score, s.uid from score as s join exam as e on s.examCode = e.examCode where e.subjectCode = #{subjectCode} and s.uid = #{uid}

select m.grade, m.classnumber, m.studentnumber, u.uname, u.uid from subject as s inner join member as m on s.subjectcode=m.subjectcode inner join user as u on m.uid=u.uid where s.subjectcode=#{subjectCode} and s.uid=#{uid}
and m.grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade}, '%')
and m.classNumber like CONCAT('%', #{classNumber}, '%')
and m.studentNumber like CONCAT('%', #{studentNumber}, '%')
and u.uname like CONCAT('%', #{uname}, '%')
select s.examCode, s.score, s.uid from score as s join exam as e on s.examCode = e.examCode where e.subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and s.uid=#{uid}
